name: Florentine
description:
This is a confessional Twine I began in March 2016 while dealing with a major life change. I wanted to capture what it was like to feel like you were being eaten alive in a relationship. I shelved the project for four months and returned to it in July 2016, finishing the story and providing minimal edits.

The story is largely based on my own experiences, but with metaphors and symbolism. I hope you enjoy.

For Rachel, Marcos, and Sophia. Thank you.

Credit to Leon Arnott for the CSS passage transition script.
